ingredients.ingredient: 2 ripe pears - peeled, cored, and cubed

cookingTips: Cook pears gently with thyme to infuse flavor without breaking down fruit structure
Cool pear mixture completely before filling ravioli to prevent pasta from becoming too moist
Use less filling than you think; overfilled ravioli burst during cooking
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user balance delicate pear filling with assertive Gorgonzola flavor and maintain pasta integrity during assembly and cooking.
